description: This is the flagship of the Crossbone Vanguard fleet, which also serves as Iron Mask`s base of operations. Like all Crossbone Vanguard vessels, the Zamouth Garr has a retractable bridge which slides into its hull for extra protection during battle. The ship itself can separate into four sections - prow, stern, and two catapult decks. The prow section deploys the automated anti-personnel weapons known as Bugs, and the stern section contains the mobile armor http://anidb.net/ch1728 [Rafflesia].
name: Zamouth Garr
